sentences.en: Ahmet is also a little more serious about schoolwork.
sentences.cn: 但是阿赫麦特比阿里更加外向一点.

sentences.en: Don't lay a guilt trip on your child about schoolwork.
sentences.cn: 别因为功课责备孩子而使他觉得很内疚.

sentences.en: Family frictions can interfere with a child's schoolwork.
sentences.cn: 家庭中的争吵会影响孩子的学业.

sentences.en: Is her schoolwork up to scratch?
Jeff has a very casual attitude towards his schoolwork.
sentences.cn: 杰夫对待功课的态度很随便.

sentences.en: Makes the error analysis is sprints finally the stage essential schoolwork.
sentences.cn: 做错误分析是最后冲刺阶段必不可少的功课.

sentences.en: Many students are under pressure to keep up with their schoolwork.
sentences.cn: 为了跟上学业的进度许多学生都承受着压力.

sentences.en: My mother would help me with my schoolwork.
sentences.cn: 我的母亲会帮我做功课。

sentences.en: She knew all about my schoolwork, my hospital work etc.
sentences.cn: 她知道有关我的学业、医院工作等所有的一切。

sentences.en: She shows great diligence in her schoolwork.
She used to bully me into doing my schoolwork.
sentences.cn: 她过去总是强迫我写作业。

sentences.en: Some of my friends were confused and did not understand their schoolwork.
sentences.cn: 我有一些同学很不开窍,不理解书上的东西.

sentences.en: The boy has a bad attitude towards his schoolwork.
sentences.cn: 他儿子对待工作的态度让他很生气.

sentences.en: Thus, they can concentrate on schoolwork and their families.
sentences.cn: 因此, 他们可以更专注于学校的学业和家庭生活.

sentences.en: Young people believe adulthood means freedom from parents and schoolwork.
sentences.cn: 年轻人深信成年就意味着拜托学业的困扰和父母的束缚.

trans.tran_en: work done for or during school classes
